title: Honoring Melissa Lamica for her consummate courage and bravery, demonstrating heroic action in a time of need which serves as an inspiration to us all
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION honoring Melissa Lamica for her consummate cour-
age and bravery for demonstrating heroic action in a time of need  which
serves as an inspiration to us all

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative  Body  to  recognize  and
commend  the  caring  concern  and  heroic  acts of individuals who take
prompt and appropriate action in  emergency  situations,  nobly  risking
their own lives in an effort to preserve the life of another; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Melissa Lamica
for  her  consummate courage and bravery for demonstrating heroic action
in a time of need by saving the life of a  four  month  old  prematurely
born  baby, who had stopped breathing in the waiting room at the Platts-
burgh Family Courthouse on Tuesday, November 16, 2010; and
  WHEREAS, The quick actions of Melissa Lamica saved the  precious  life
of a four month old prematurely born baby, who had stopped breathing, by
using  her  newly  attained Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) training
skills; and
  WHEREAS, Melissa Lamica has given not only of her  time  and  energies
but also of her competence, intelligence and leadership and consequently
has been designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the custom of this Legislative Body to recognize the
caring concern and heroic acts of  those  exemplary  citizens  who  take
prompt  and  appropriate action in emergency situations and in doing so,
help others to avert life-threatening danger; and
  WHEREAS, Through her spontaneous and heroic actions,  Melissa  Lamica,
demonstrated her character and her compassion for the welfare of others,
personifying,  by virtue of her actions, the collective concern of ordi-
nary citizens across the community of the State of New York  who  volun-
tarily respond when others are in need of help; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Melissa Lamica for her consummate courage and bravery  for  demon-
strating heroic action in a time of need; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Melissa Lamica.
